title: Nutraceutical Excipient Market Size to Exceed USD 9.42 Billion by 2034 | Towards FnB
description: According to Towards FnB, the global nutraceutical excipient market size is evaluated at USD 4.87 billion in 2025 and is anticipated to surge USD 9.42 billion by 2034, expanding at a CAGR of 7.65% from 2025 to 2034. This surge is driven by the rising consumer…
